mapper.select:
select `record`.*, `user`.`userName` as userName,`activity`.`title` as activityName from `record` left join `user` on `record`.`userId` = `user`.id left join `activity` on `record`.`activityId` = `activity`.id
where 1 = 1
and `record`.`userName` like concat ('%', #{search.userName}, '%')
and `record`.`userId` = #{userId}
